regen.absent_element: indication of any non-operational periods of the DH System
regen.new_specification: The month report shall include data on any non-operational periods of the DH System, specifying the dates and duration of such periods.

regen.absent_element: indication of non-operational periods of the DH System
regen.new_specification: The monthly report shall indicate any non-operational periods of the DH System, including starting and ending dates and times.

regen.absent_element: indicating non-operational periods of the DH System
regen.new_specification: The month report shall indicate any non-operational periods of the DigitalHome System within the specified month.

label: The month report shall provide a section that indicates the periods of time when the DH System was not in operation.
absence: indication of periods when the DH System was not in operation
